Package gears.sidescroller.world.machines

package gears.sidescroller.world.machines
Machines are interactive components of the game world. This package handles various machine-y things, including machine definitions, common behavior, random generation, and serialization. Machines may share some similar functionality, so I'll implement more interfaces as it becomes clearer what sort of things many different machines may do. Should you decide to implement a new AbstractMachine subclass, you'll need to change MachineGenerator accordingly.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractMachine
    Machines are interactable elements in the game world.
    ConveyorBeltSegment
    A ConveryorBeltSegment is a machine which will move AbstractEntities in a given direction, assuming it is powered.
    GearMachine
    A GearMachine is a machine which can serve as a repeater for power provided to it.
    LanternMachine
     
    MachineGenerator
    The MachineGenerator is used to randomly generate machines for AreaGenerator.
    PlacedGearMachine
    A PlacedGearMachine is simply a GearMachine a Player has placed via a GearItem.
    PlacedLanternMachine
     
    PowerPlant
    A PowerPlant is simply a machine which provides power.
    PowerProvidingMachine
    Machines implementing the PowerProvidingMachine interface will provide power for other Machines.
